Award.AwardTitle: A Web-Accessible Knowledge Base for the Integrated Analysis and Valuation of Ecosystem Services
Award.AbstractNarration: The objective valuation of the world's ecological systems and services and its natural capital stocks is an issue of global importance. The proposed activity applies a functional modeling approach to collected information archives. The resulting analysis tools should prove useful to a broad sector of the science and policy making community. The proposed activities would lead to a web-based, publicly accessible resource for primary data storage and subsequent modeling for use in policy development as well as scientific research.

Institution.Name: University of Vermont & State Agricultural College
